about:
Aspiring Software Developer and MCA student skilled in Python, Flask, SQL, and modern web technologies, focused on building secure and user-friendly applications.

I’m currently pursuing an MCA at Gayathri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering and hold a B.Sc. in Computer Science. I build secure web applications using Python, Flask, and SQL, including an LLM-powered conversational agent with authentication, REST APIs, and database integration.

I also work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and basic React, and enjoy creating clean, intuitive user interfaces. I’m continuously learning and actively seeking internship or entry-level opportunities where I can contribute to real-world projects and grow as a software developer.
